answer:
Adults should only have one influenza vaccine (flu shot) for the 2019/20 season. Canada's National Advisory Committee on Immunization (NACI) recommends that any of the available influenza vaccines should be used in people 65 and older. There has been a delay in the delivery of the Fluzone.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Adults should only have one influenza vaccine (flu shot) for the 2019/20 season.

Canada's National Advisory Committee on Immunization (NACI) recommends that any of the available influenza vaccines should be used in people 65 and older.

## There has been a delay in the delivery of the Fluzone.

Immunization Nurse
question: I take high dose Fluzone. Not available in Kelowna till Dec. got the regular flu vaccine. Can I take high dose when it becomes available? What happened to BC and high dose?
question_variation_0: what happens to bc high dose and high dose fluzone
question_variation_1: can i take high dose fluzone vaccine
question_variation_2: what does high dose fluzone vaccine come in
